flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: A sweet aromangently wafts fromnthe leaf on itsfhead. It is docilenand loves to soaknup the sun's rays.
Its pleasantlynaromatic leavesnhave the abilityfto check the hu­nmidity and tem­nperature.
It loves to basknin the sunlight.nIt uses the leaffon its head tonseek out warmnplaces.

In battle, CHIKORITA waves its leafnaround to keep the foe at bay.nHowever, a sweet fragrance also waftsffrom the leaf, becalming the battlingnPOKéMON and creating a cozy, friendlynatmosphere all around.

Its pleasantly aromatic leaves have thenability to check the humidity andntemperature.

It uses the leaf on its head tondetermine the temperature andnhumidity. It loves to sunbathe.

あたまのはっぱから　ほのかに　あまいnかおりが　ただよう。おとなしくてnひざしを　あびるのが　だいすき。
머리의 잎사귀에서 살짝 달콤한n향기가 감돈다. 얌전하며n햇볕을 쬐는 것을 매우 좋아한다.
Un doux parfum émane de la feuille placée sur sa tête.nIl est très gentil et aime dormir au soleil.
Ein süßer Duft geht von dem Blatt auf seinem Kopfnaus. Es ist ruhig und liegt gerne in der Sonne.
Un dulce aroma se desprende de la hoja de suncabeza. Es dócil y le encanta absorber los rayosnde sol.
Un dolce profumo si diffonde dalla sua testa.nÈ docile e ama scaldarsi al sole.
A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on itsnhead. It is docile and loves to soak up sun rays.
頭の　葉っぱから　ほのかに　甘いn香りが　漂う。おとなしくてn日差しを　浴びるのが　大好き。
あたまの　はっぱで　まわりのnおんどや　しつどを　さぐる。nひざしを　あびることが　だいすき。
머리의 잎사귀로 주위의n온도나 습도를 살핀다.n햇볕을 쬐는 것을 매우 좋아한다.
Il jauge la température et l’humidité grâce à la feuillensur sa tête. Il raffole des bains de soleil.
Mit dem Blatt auf seinem Kopf bestimmt es dienTemperatur und Feuchtigkeit. Es liebt Sonnenbäder.
Con la hoja de su cabeza puede medir la temperaturany la humedad. Le encanta tomar el sol.
Usa la foglia sulla sua testa per misurare lantemperatura e l’umidità. Ama crogiolarsi al sole.
It uses the leaf on its head to determine thentemperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.
頭の　葉っぱで　まわりのn温度や　湿度を　探る。n日差しを　浴びることが　大好き。
はっぱを　ふりまわして　あいてを　いかくするがnはっぱから　あまい　かおりが　ただようのでnおたがいに　なごやかな　ふんいきに　なるよ。
잎사귀를 휘둘러 상대를 위협하지만n잎사귀에서 달콤한 향기가 풍겨 나와n서로 온화한 분위기가 된다.
Lorsqu’il se bat, Germignon secoue sa feuille pour tenir sonnennemi à distance. Un doux parfum s’en dégage également,napaisant les Pokémon qui se battent et créant une atmosphèrenagréable et amicale.

Im Kampf wedelt Endivie mit seinem Blatt, um den Feindnfernzuhalten. Von dem Blatt geht auch ein süßlicher Duft aus,nder die kämpfenden Pokémon beruhigt und eine gemütliche,nfreundliche Atmosphäre schafft.
Al luchar, Chikorita agita la hoja que tiene para mantener anraya al rival. Pero, al mismo tiempo, libera una suave fragancianque apacigua el encuentro y crea un ambiente agradable y denamistad.

Nella lotta, Chikorita sventola la sua foglia in modo da tenerena bada il nemico. Tuttavia, la foglia emana anche un aromandolce, che calma il Pokémon avversario, creando un’atmosferangradevole e rilassata tutt’attorno.

In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe atnbay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf,nbecalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendlynatmosphere all around.
葉っぱを　振り回して　相手を　威嚇するがn葉っぱから　甘い　香りが　漂うのでnお互いに　和やかな　雰囲気に　なるよ。

In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe atnbay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf,nbecalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy,nfriendly atmosphere all around.
